columns.name: capacity_reservation_id
columns.description: The ID of the capacity reservation.

columns.name: capacity_reservation_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the capacity reservation.

columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The type of instance for which the capacity reservation reserves capacity.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the capacity reservation. A capacity reservation can be in one of the following states: 'active', 'expired', 'cancelled', 'pending', 'failed'.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The availability zone in which the capacity is reserved.

columns.name: availability_zone_id
columns.description: The availability zone ID of the capacity reservation.

columns.name: available_instance_count
columns.description: The remaining capacity. Indicates the number of instances that can be launched in the capacity reservation.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time at which the capacity reservation was created.

columns.name: ebs_optimized
columns.description: Indicates whether the capacity reservation supports EBS-optimized instances.

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: The date and time at which the capacity reservation expires.

columns.name: end_date_type
columns.description: Indicates the way in which the capacity reservation ends. A capacity reservation can have one of the following end types: 'unlimited', 'limited'.

columns.name: ephemeral_storage
columns.description: Indicates whether the capacity reservation supports instances with temporary, block-level storage.

columns.name: instance_match_criteria
columns.description: Indicates the type of instance launches that the capacity reservation accepts. The options include: 'open', 'targeted'.

columns.name: instance_platform
columns.description: The type of operating system for which the capacity reservation reserves capacity.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the capacity reservation.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: The date and time at which the capacity reservation was started.

columns.name: tenancy
columns.description: Indicates the tenancy of the capacity reservation. A capacity reservation can have one of the following tenancy settings: 'default', 'dedicated'.

columns.name: total_instance_count
columns.description: The total number of instances for which the capacity reservation reserves capacity.

columns.name: capacity_allocations
columns.description: Information about instance capacity usage.

columns.name: tag_src
columns.description: Any tags assigned to the capacity reservation.
